attributes.action: pass a law or act which deals with customers who misuse their bank/building society accounts and abuse the currently free service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Customers taking banks/building societies to court to get bank charges refunded are potentially leading us all down a path which could mean we eventually have to pay for the privilege of holding any kind of bank account. People are being charged for money which they have taken without previous authorisation from their bank and are now complaining about being charged for it after having essentially stolen money from the bank. Should we eventually pay for people to steal from the banks? Sign if you believe people should take responsibility for their own mistakes.
